derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English nihtscada, apparently from night + shade, probably with reference to the dark colour and poisonous properties of the berries. Compare with German Nachtschatten

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous shrubs or herbs or vines of the genus Solanum; most are poisonous though many bear edible fruit
